markdownRemark.html:
Many of you have probably heard about the WMF exploit that Microsoft still does not have a fix for yet. Steve Gibson over at GRC is hosting a fix and a vulnerablity checker on his web site.

The fix and the vulnerability checker were developed by Ilfak Guilfanov and tested by Steve Gibson.

I consider Steve Gibson the best resource on Computer Security. He hosts a podcast with Leo Leporte called Security Now that is a must listen.

frontmatter.title: Warning about Microsoft SQL Server 2000 DTS Designer Components
